Housing Data Overview Explore trends in rent, income, and home values across different states and years. --- ## Race-Based Income Distribution ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} plotOutput("income_by_race") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell context='server'} ```{.r .cell-code} renderPlot({ housing_cleaned %>% ggplot(aes(x = factor(RACE), y = FTOTINC)) + geom_boxplot(fill = "skyblue", outlier.shape = NA) + scale_y_log10() + labs(title = "Household Income by Race (2023)", x = "Race Code", y = "Total Household Income (log scale)") }) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
